vignette.name: Status Bar
vignette.bodytext: The Status Bar is located directly under the patching area in a Max Patcher window. It displays useful information about whatever item is currently located under the mouse, and can be used to obtain reference information for objects or learn what something does in the Max user interface.

ul.li: If the Status Bar is not visible in your Max Patcher window, click on the Show Status Bar icon in the Patcher window toolbar to show the clue window. To hide the Status Bar, click on the Show Status Bar icon.

bluebox.bodytext: The Status Bar is visible by default. Its behavior can be altered by changing the Show Status Bar on Open setting in the Patcher Inspector.
